fields.name: DevBoxDefinitionName
fields.description: Name of a Dev Box definition in parent Project of this Pool

fields.name: HealthStatus
fields.description: Overall health status of the Pool. Indicates whether or not the Pool is available to create Dev Boxes.

fields.name: HealthStatusDetails
fields.description: Details on the Pool health status to help diagnose issues. This is only populated when the pool status indicates the pool is in a non-healthy state

fields.name: LicenseType
fields.description: Specifies the license type indicating the caller has already acquired licenses for the Dev Boxes that will be created.

fields.name: LocalAdministrator
fields.description: Indicates whether owners of Dev Boxes in this pool are added as local administrators on the Dev Box.

fields.name: NetworkConnectionName
fields.description: Name of a Network Connection in parent Project of this Pool

fields.name: StopOnDisconnect
fields.description: Stop on disconnect configuration settings for Dev Boxes created in this pool.
